replies.body: Disappointed in this game mode. Please bring back URF best game mode Riot have made.
So true, same champs are being played in this game mode... hopefully URF in April or something. plz RIOT {{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}

I've been playing this game for four years now and I was disappointed, this game mode by far is my least favourite and for many others as well, Urf mode was the best mode you guys have made and I'm speaking for all the league players Bring Back Urf Riot!!!
True Bring Back Urf Riot
when does it begin? i cant wait to give {{champion:133}} to everyone
Dude {{champion:133}} is powerful as fuck
Please do
This is horrible, im sorry but the queue dodging ruins everything. I have been in 8 lobbies, none of which have started... -_-
I believe the penalty for dodging have been increased. If you dodge during Nemesis draft, you also won't receive an icon at the end of when the game mode is available!
What if you disconnect during a champion select? Isn't it a little unfair to the people who dc?
i accidently didnt select a champ for the enemy team does this mean i dont get the icon?
If you dodge, you should be banned from this mode until it finishes
Its like back when there was no delay for dodging an aram lobby

I am Sadly disappointed in this game mode, the queue dodging is just awful.. was really a horrible idea considering the usual awesome standards of these limited game types.
And after 20 minutes your game does start, you have to play an awful champ against other awful champs.. really not even fun. rito pls
where does it say how to get icon?

So because I'm cursed with having Tony Abbott as my PM and my internet is from the 1920's if my net screws up during champ select (which it has and I've been promised to never do it again) I miss out on the summoner icon? 

Laaame, I don't think a summoner icon would stop being from dodgying anyway
LOL ahahahhahahah. Made me laugh so hard.
{{champion:26}} = op
They didn't think I'd get that fed....but I did
You forgot in the Q&A section 1 important question. Whens URF coming back? :3
My game crashed in que, will I be penalized?
que?

Played my main girl Raka and fed horribly, then went first time Taric and pulled off some sick plays and won the game hard.
WHAT?
Boy oh boy I can't wait to have yet another icon of Ziggs' face!
summoner icon...dat'll draw them in

This game mode is lots of fun and lets me show off my support main skills. Its actually surprisingly hard to pick bad champs because there aren't that many. Personally I think this is way more fun than URF cause URF was just a no skill spam fest.

I got an idea for a new gamemode

All for URF

Everyone gets the same champion, and it is in urf mode!

all of the possibilities

The Chain of {{champion:12}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:238}} and so many more!
keep getting trolls who join as a group and choose a good comp for the other team. bring back URF or ascension.

I want URF MODE like come on riot just give us what we want.. even an Nemesis Draft URF MODE would be good at least the game wouldn't last  40 mins and be boring as hell. Stupid game mode but has potential with the help of URF.
Riot, can you please bring back "URF" and "All For One". I never got to play them and they seem really, REALLY fun!

Fairly disappointed riot. I never seen so much trolling/negativity in one gametype. Players are forced to play a champ that they don't even own, which results in very one sided games. 

I'd expect it to be more balanced if you were only allowed champs that you own. I'm positive the almost all negativity would disappear
The whole point is to pick the enemy team champions for your advantage. Doesn't seem like a troll when they can do it to you aswell
URF PLS! :D

Enemy team gave me poppy and i won the game for our team :D
Nemesis mode lets you practise champs you dont/wont play and its all goods!
this game mode sounds like a alot of fun but not when you get stuck with toxic people now seems like the time for{{champion:37}} to shine lol all champs are op
Lol wtf {{champion:6}} is so OP I can beat almost anyone with him.

this mode is pretty cool but fundamentally broken player-choice side. We choose only weakest champions and if team A doesn't know a champion like anivia or elise and they give it to team B, team B will win no matter what. I don't get what was the point of that mode tbh, it was fun for couple of matches but taric/urgot/galio bans and teams consisting of janna lulu and nami are not fun for longer runs
why is it that when I play nemesis draft it costs 150rp and not 125rp? I don't understand o__o"
{{summoner:4}}
The solution is simple: Have a 1 or 2 week rotation for the game modes. Meaning that every 9-18 weeks (as there are presently 9 game modes). The roster will repeat
Uh oh. i accidentally didnt pick a champ in champ select. i panicked and tried to pick all the crap champs but they were all banned, but time ran out. would i still be able to get the icon?
BRING URF BAAAACK{{champion:76}} {{champion:120}}
its kinda good but bring back URF my little sis wanna play it bc she never has so pls!
I've found that I can use this gamemode in customs with friends to try out champions that I don't own, at least one thing good came out of this mode.
I have 123 rp can you lower the battle boosts to at least 120
The only good thing about this game mode is that I got to play battlecast {{champion:72}}
Ok, so what happens to your RP if you buy battle boost and someone dodges the queue? DO you get refunded or not?
It's so sad that every time anything about anything relating to Featured Game Modes is posted by Rito, the floodgates for URF comments are opened...

I'm sick of ditchers. Three lobbies in a row, all the way to seconds before the game loads, and they leave. 15min of trying to find a game. I understand there is a penalty for leaving, but it isn't enough.
